https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qElmjwRZuOQmzgmWRixFd7xEmPn.jpg It is 1967, and Larry Gopnik, a physics professor at a quiet Midwestern university, has just been informed by his wife Judith that she is leaving him. She has fallen in love with one of his more pompous acquaintances Sy Ableman. A Serious Man
